metadata.title: USN-5960-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: Yebo Cao discovered that Python incorrectly handled certain URLs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass blocklisting methods by supplying a URL that starts with blank characters.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5960-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libpython3.10-minimal - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 idle-python3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-doc - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-minimal - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-examples - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 libpython3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 libpython3.10-dev - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 libpython3.10-testsuite - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-dev - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 libpython3.10-stdlib - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-venv - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-nopie - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 python3.10-full - 3.10.6-1~22.04.2ubuntu1 No subscription required
